description: Straight-cut trousers in worsted wool, kiln-black color

core:description.text: Trousers of worsted wool in a deep kiln-black, cut straight from hip to ankle with no taper or flare. The wool has the smooth, hard finish of proper worstedâ€”spun tight and woven close, resistant to wrinkles and showing wear slowly. A single pleat at each hip provides ease of movement without excess fabric. The color is the black of things fired in kilns: not the soft black of dye, but the carbon-deep black of transformation by heat. Professional trousers for someone who stands while others sit.
